018package com.scivicslab.actoriac;
019
020import java.io.File;
021import java.io.FileInputStream;
022import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
023import java.io.IOException;
024import java.io.InputStream;
025import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;
026import java.util.logging.Level;
027import java.util.logging.Logger;
028
029import org.json.JSONArray;
030import org.json.JSONObject;
031
032import com.github.lalyos.jfiglet.FigletFont;
033import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
034import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRef;
035import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorSystem;
036
037/**
038 * Interpreter-interfaced actor reference for {@link NodeInterpreter} instances.
039 *
040 * <p>This class provides a concrete implementation of {@link IIActorRef}
041 * specifically for {@link NodeInterpreter} objects. It handles action invocations
042 * by name, supporting both workflow execution actions (inherited from Interpreter)
043 * and infrastructure actions (SSH command execution).</p>
044 *
045 * <p><strong>Supported actions:</strong></p>
046 * <p><em>Workflow actions (from Interpreter):</em></p>
047 * <ul>
048 *   <li>{@code execCode} - Executes the loaded workflow code</li>
049 *   <li>{@code readYaml} - Reads a YAML workflow definition from a file path</li>
050 *   <li>{@code readJson} - Reads a JSON workflow definition from a file path</li>
051 *   <li>{@code readXml} - Reads an XML workflow definition from a file path</li>
052 *   <li>{@code reset} - Resets the interpreter state</li>
053 * </ul>
054 * <p><em>Infrastructure actions (Node-specific):</em></p>
055 * <ul>
056 *   <li>{@code executeCommand} - Executes a command and reports to accumulator (default)</li>
057 *   <li>{@code executeCommandQuiet} - Executes a command without reporting</li>
058 *   <li>{@code executeSudoCommand} - Executes sudo command and reports to accumulator (default)</li>
059 *   <li>{@code executeSudoCommandQuiet} - Executes sudo command without reporting</li>
060 * </ul>
061 *
062 * <p><strong>Example YAML Workflow:</strong></p>
063 * <pre>{@code
064 * name: deploy-application
065 * steps:
066 *   - states: ["0", "1"]
067 *     actions:
068 *       - actor: this
069 *         method: executeCommand
070 *         arguments:
071 *           - "apt-get update"
072 *   - states: ["1", "end"]
073 *     actions:
074 *       - actor: this
075 *         method: executeCommand
076 *         arguments:
077 *           - "ls -la"
078 * }</pre>
079 *
080 * @author devteam@scivicslab.com
081 */
082public class NodeIIAR extends IIActorRef<NodeInterpreter> {
083
084    Logger logger = null;
085
086    /**
087     * Constructs a new NodeIIAR with the specified actor name and node interpreter object.
088     *
089     * @param actorName the name of this actor
090     * @param object the {@link NodeInterpreter} instance managed by this actor reference
091     */
092    public NodeIIAR(String actorName, NodeInterpreter object) {
093        super(actorName, object);
094        logger = Logger.getLogger(actorName);
095    }
096
097    /**
098     * Constructs a new NodeIIAR with the specified actor name, node interpreter object,
099     * and actor system.
100     *
101     * @param actorName the name of this actor
102     * @param object the {@link NodeInterpreter} instance managed by this actor reference
103     * @param system the actor system managing this actor
104     */
105    public NodeIIAR(String actorName, NodeInterpreter object, IIActorSystem system) {
106        super(actorName, object, system);
107        logger = Logger.getLogger(actorName);
108
109        // Set the selfActorRef in the Interpreter (NodeInterpreter extends Interpreter)
110        object.setSelfActorRef(this);
111    }
112
113    /**
114     * Invokes an action on the node by name with the given arguments.
115     *
116     * <p>This method dispatches to specialized handler methods based on the action type:</p>
117     * <ul>
118     *   <li>Workflow actions: {@link #handleWorkflowAction}</li>
119     *   <li>Command execution actions: {@link #handleCommandAction}</li>
120     *   <li>Utility actions: {@link #handleUtilityAction}</li>
121     * </ul>
122     *
123     * @param actionName the name of the action to execute
124     * @param arg the argument string (file path for read operations, JSON array for commands)
125     * @return an {@link ActionResult} indicating success or failure with a message
126     */
127    @Override
128    public ActionResult callByActionName(String actionName, String arg) {
129        logger.fine(String.format("actionName = %s, args = %s", actionName, arg));
130
131        try {
132            // Workflow execution actions (from Interpreter)
133            ActionResult workflowResult = handleWorkflowAction(actionName, arg);
134            if (workflowResult != null) {
135                return workflowResult;
136            }
137
138            // Node-specific actions (SSH command execution)
139            ActionResult commandResult = handleCommandAction(actionName, arg);
140            if (commandResult != null) {
141                return commandResult;
142            }
143
144            // Utility actions
145            ActionResult utilityResult = handleUtilityAction(actionName, arg);
146            if (utilityResult != null) {
147                return utilityResult;
148            }
149
150            // Document workflow actions
151            ActionResult documentResult = handleDocumentAction(actionName, arg);
152            if (documentResult != null) {
153                return documentResult;
154            }
155
156            // Try parent class (IIActorRef) for JSON State API actions (putJson, getJson, etc.)
157            ActionResult parentResult = super.callByActionName(actionName, arg);
158            if (parentResult.isSuccess() || !parentResult.getResult().startsWith("Unknown action:")) {
159                return parentResult;
160            }
161
162            // Unknown action
163            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("Unknown action: actorName = %s, action = %s, arg = %s",
164                    this.getName(), actionName, arg));
165            return new ActionResult(false, "Unknown action: " + actionName);
166
167        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
168            String message = "Interrupted: " + e.getMessage();
169            logger.warning(String.format("%s: %s", this.getName(), message));
170            return new ActionResult(false, message);
171        } catch (ExecutionException e) {
172            String message = extractRootCauseMessage(e);
173            logger.warning(String.format("%s: %s", this.getName(), message));
174            return new ActionResult(false, message);
175        }
176    }
177
178    /**
179     * Handles workflow-related actions (from Interpreter).
180     *
181     * @param actionName the action name
182     * @param arg the argument string
183     * @return ActionResult if handled, null if not a workflow action
184     */
185    private ActionResult handleWorkflowAction(String actionName, String arg)
186            throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
187
188        switch (actionName) {
189            case "execCode":
190                return this.ask(n -> n.execCode()).get();
191
192            case "readYaml":
193                return handleReadYaml(arg);
194
195            case "readJson":
196                return handleReadJson(arg);
197
198            case "readXml":
199                return handleReadXml(arg);
200
201            case "reset":
202                this.tell(n -> n.reset()).get();
203                return new ActionResult(true, "Interpreter reset successfully");
204
205            case "runUntilEnd":
206                int maxIterations = parseMaxIterations(arg, 10000);
207                return this.ask(n -> n.runUntilEnd(maxIterations)).get();
208
209            case "call":
210                JSONArray callArgs = new JSONArray(arg);
211                String callWorkflowFile = callArgs.getString(0);
212                return this.ask(n -> n.call(callWorkflowFile)).get();
213
214            case "runWorkflow":
215                JSONArray runArgs = new JSONArray(arg);
216                String runWorkflowFile = runArgs.getString(0);
217                int runMaxIterations = runArgs.length() > 1 ? runArgs.getInt(1) : 10000;
218                logger.fine(String.format("Running workflow: %s (maxIterations=%d)", runWorkflowFile, runMaxIterations));
219                ActionResult result = this.object.runWorkflow(runWorkflowFile, runMaxIterations);
220                logger.fine(String.format("Workflow completed: success=%s, result=%s", result.isSuccess(), result.getResult()));
221                return result;
222
223            case "apply":
224                return this.ask(n -> n.apply(arg)).get();
225
226            default:
227                return null; // Not a workflow action
228        }
229    }
230
231    /**
232     * Handles SSH command execution actions.
233     *
234     * @param actionName the action name
235     * @param arg the argument string
236     * @return ActionResult if handled, null if not a command action
237     */
238    private ActionResult handleCommandAction(String actionName, String arg)
239            throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
240
241        switch (actionName) {
242            case "executeCommandQuiet":
243                return executeCommandQuiet(arg);
244
245            case "executeSudoCommandQuiet":
246                return executeSudoCommandQuiet(arg);
247
248            case "executeCommand":
249                return executeCommandWithReport(arg);
250
251            case "executeSudoCommand":
252                return executeSudoCommandWithReport(arg);
253
254            default:
255                return null; // Not a command action
256        }
257    }
258
259    /**
260     * Handles utility actions (sleep, print, doNothing).
261     *
262     * @param actionName the action name
263     * @param arg the argument string
264     * @return ActionResult if handled, null if not a utility action
265     */
266    private ActionResult handleUtilityAction(String actionName, String arg) {
267        switch (actionName) {
268            case "sleep":
269                try {
270                    long millis = Long.parseLong(arg);
271                    Thread.sleep(millis);
272                    return new ActionResult(true, "Slept for " + millis + "ms");
273                } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
274                    logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("Invalid sleep duration: %s", arg), e);
275                    return new ActionResult(false, "Invalid sleep duration: " + arg);
276                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
277                    return new ActionResult(false, "Sleep interrupted: " + e.getMessage());
278                }
279
280            case "print":
281                System.out.println(arg);
282                return new ActionResult(true, "Printed: " + arg);
283
284            case "doNothing":
285                return new ActionResult(true, arg);
286
287            default:
288                return null; // Not a utility action
289        }
290    }
291
292    /**
293     * Handles document workflow actions (detect, clone, build, deploy).
294     *
295     * @param actionName the action name
296     * @param arg the argument string
297     * @return ActionResult if handled, null if not a document action
298     */
299    private ActionResult handleDocumentAction(String actionName, String arg)
300            throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
301
302        switch (actionName) {
303            case "detectDocumentChanges":
304                return this.ask(n -> {
305                    try {
306                        String docListPath = extractCommandFromArgs(arg);
307                        return n.detectDocumentChanges(docListPath);
308                    } catch (IOException e) {
309                        return new ActionResult(false, "Error detecting changes: " + e.getMessage());
310                    }
311                }).get();
312
313            case "cloneChangedDocuments":
314                return this.ask(n -> {
315                    try {
316                        String docListPath = extractCommandFromArgs(arg);
317                        return n.cloneChangedDocuments(docListPath);
318                    } catch (IOException e) {
319                        return new ActionResult(false, "Error cloning documents: " + e.getMessage());
320                    }
321                }).get();
322
323            case "buildChangedDocuments":
324                return this.ask(n -> {
325                    try {
326                        String docListPath = extractCommandFromArgs(arg);
327                        return n.buildChangedDocuments(docListPath);
328                    } catch (IOException e) {
329                        return new ActionResult(false, "Error building documents: " + e.getMessage());
330                    }
331                }).get();
332
333            case "deployChangedDocuments":
334                return this.ask(n -> {
335                    try {
336                        String docListPath = extractCommandFromArgs(arg);
337                        return n.deployChangedDocuments(docListPath);
338                    } catch (IOException e) {
339                        return new ActionResult(false, "Error deploying documents: " + e.getMessage());
340                    }
341                }).get();
342
343            default:
344                return null; // Not a document action
345        }
346    }
347
348    // --- Helper methods for workflow actions ---
349
350    private ActionResult handleReadYaml(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
351        try {
352            String overlayPath = this.object.getOverlayDir();
353            if (overlayPath != null) {
354                java.nio.file.Path yamlPath = java.nio.file.Path.of(arg);
355                java.nio.file.Path overlayDir = java.nio.file.Path.of(overlayPath);
356                this.tell(n -> {
357                    try {
358                        n.readYaml(yamlPath, overlayDir);
359                    } catch (IOException e) {
360                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
361                    }
362                }).get();
363                return new ActionResult(true, "YAML loaded with overlay: " + overlayPath);
364            } else {
365                try (InputStream input = new FileInputStream(new File(arg))) {
366                    this.tell(n -> n.readYaml(input)).get();
367                    return new ActionResult(true, "YAML loaded successfully");
368                }
369            }
370        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
371            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("file not found: %s", arg), e);
372            return new ActionResult(false, "File not found: " + arg);
373        } catch (IOException e) {
374            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("IOException: %s", arg), e);
375            return new ActionResult(false, "IO error: " + arg);
376        } catch (RuntimeException e) {
377            if (e.getCause() instanceof IOException) {
378                logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("IOException: %s", arg), e.getCause());
379                return new ActionResult(false, "IO error: " + arg);
380            }
381            throw e;
382        }
383    }
384
385    private ActionResult handleReadJson(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
386        try (InputStream input = new FileInputStream(new File(arg))) {
387            this.tell(n -> {
388                try {
389                    n.readJson(input);
390                } catch (IOException e) {
391                    throw new RuntimeException(e);
392                }
393            }).get();
394            return new ActionResult(true, "JSON loaded successfully");
395        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
396            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("file not found: %s", arg), e);
397            return new ActionResult(false, "File not found: " + arg);
398        } catch (IOException e) {
399            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("IOException: %s", arg), e);
400            return new ActionResult(false, "IO error: " + arg);
401        }
402    }
403
404    private ActionResult handleReadXml(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
405        try (InputStream input = new FileInputStream(new File(arg))) {
406            this.tell(n -> {
407                try {
408                    n.readXml(input);
409                } catch (Exception e) {
410                    throw new RuntimeException(e);
411                }
412            }).get();
413            return new ActionResult(true, "XML loaded successfully");
414        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
415            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("file not found: %s", arg), e);
416            return new ActionResult(false, "File not found: " + arg);
417        } catch (Exception e) {
418            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, String.format("Exception: %s", arg), e);
419            return new ActionResult(false, "Error: " + arg);
420        }
421    }
422
423    private int parseMaxIterations(String arg, int defaultValue) {
424        if (arg != null && !arg.isEmpty() && !arg.equals("[]")) {
425            try {
426                JSONArray args = new JSONArray(arg);
427                if (args.length() > 0) {
428                    return args.getInt(0);
429                }
430            } catch (Exception e) {
431                // Use default if parsing fails
432            }
433        }
434        return defaultValue;
435    }
436
437    // --- Helper methods for command actions ---
438
439    private ActionResult executeCommandQuiet(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
440        String command = extractCommandFromArgs(arg);
441        Node.CommandResult result = this.ask(n -> {
442            try {
443                return n.executeCommand(command);
444            } catch (IOException e) {
445                throw new RuntimeException(e);
446            }
447        }).get();
448
449        return new ActionResult(result.isSuccess(),
450            String.format("exitCode=%d, stdout='%s', stderr='%s'",
451                result.getExitCode(), result.getStdout(), result.getStderr()));
452    }
453
454    private ActionResult executeSudoCommandQuiet(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
455        String command = extractCommandFromArgs(arg);
456        Node.CommandResult result = this.ask(n -> {
457            try {
458                return n.executeSudoCommand(command);
459            } catch (IOException e) {
460                throw new RuntimeException(e);
461            }
462        }).get();
463
464        return new ActionResult(result.isSuccess(),
465            String.format("exitCode=%d, stdout='%s', stderr='%s'",
466                result.getExitCode(), result.getStdout(), result.getStderr()));
467    }
468
469    private ActionResult executeCommandWithReport(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
470        String command = extractCommandFromArgs(arg);
471        String nodeName = this.getName();
472        String transitionYaml = this.object.getCurrentTransitionYaml();
473
474        // Create callback that forwards output to multiplexer accumulator
475        Node.OutputCallback callback = createOutputCallback(nodeName);
476
477        Node.CommandResult result = this.ask(n -> {
478            try {
479                return n.executeCommand(command, callback);
480            } catch (IOException e) {
481                throw new RuntimeException(e);
482            }
483        }).get();
484
485        // Report final result to legacy accumulator actor (for backward compatibility)
486        reportToAccumulator(result);
487        return new ActionResult(result.isSuccess(), combineOutput(result));
488    }
489
490    private ActionResult executeSudoCommandWithReport(String arg) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
491        String command = extractCommandFromArgs(arg);
492        String nodeName = this.getName();
493
494        // Create callback that forwards output to multiplexer accumulator
495        Node.OutputCallback callback = createOutputCallback(nodeName);
496
497        Node.CommandResult result;
498        try {
499            result = this.ask(n -> {
500                try {
501                    return n.executeSudoCommand(command, callback);
502                } catch (IOException e) {
503                    throw new RuntimeException(e);
504                }
505            }).get();
506        } catch (ExecutionException e) {
507            // Check if this is a SUDO_PASSWORD error
508            Throwable cause = e.getCause();
509            if (cause != null && cause.getMessage() != null &&
510                cause.getMessage().contains("SUDO_PASSWORD environment variable is not set")) {
511                // Output a % message for WorkflowReporter to capture
512                String hostname = this.object.getHostname();
513                String errorMessage = "%" + hostname + ": [FAIL] SUDO_PASSWORD not set";
514                // Report to multiplexer so it gets logged
515                reportOutputToMultiplexer(nodeName, errorMessage);
516                // Return failure with the error message
517                return new ActionResult(false, errorMessage);
518            }
519            throw e;
520        }
521
522        // Report final result to legacy accumulator actor (for backward compatibility)
523        reportToAccumulator(result);
524        return new ActionResult(result.isSuccess(), combineOutput(result));
525    }
526
527    /**
528     * Creates an OutputCallback that forwards output to the multiplexer accumulator.
529     *
530     * <p>Retrieves the multiplexer actor from ActorSystem by name ("outputMultiplexer"),
531     * enabling loose coupling between NodeIIAR and MultiplexerAccumulatorIIAR.</p>
532     *
533     * @param nodeName the name of this node (used as source identifier)
534     * @return the callback, or null if multiplexer actor is not registered
535     */
536    private Node.OutputCallback createOutputCallback(String nodeName) {
537        IIActorSystem sys = (IIActorSystem) this.system();
538        IIActorRef<?> multiplexer = sys.getIIActor("outputMultiplexer");
539
540        if (multiplexer == null) {
541            // No multiplexer registered - return null (Node will not output anything)
542            return null;
543        }
544
545        return new Node.OutputCallback() {
546            @Override
547            public void onStdout(String line) {
548                JSONObject arg = new JSONObject();
549                arg.put("source", nodeName);
550                arg.put("type", "stdout");
551                arg.put("data", line);
552                multiplexer.callByActionName("add", arg.toString());
553            }
554
555            @Override
556            public void onStderr(String line) {
557                JSONObject arg = new JSONObject();
558                arg.put("source", nodeName);
559                arg.put("type", "stderr");
560                arg.put("data", line);
561                multiplexer.callByActionName("add", arg.toString());
562            }
563        };
564    }
565
566    /**
567     * Reports command result to the multiplexer accumulator actor if available.
568     *
569     * <p>Retrieves the multiplexer actor from ActorSystem by name ("outputMultiplexer").</p>
570     */
571    private void reportToAccumulator(Node.CommandResult result) {
572        IIActorSystem sys = (IIActorSystem) this.system();
573        IIActorRef<?> multiplexer = sys.getIIActor("outputMultiplexer");
574        if (multiplexer != null) {
575            JSONObject reportArg = new JSONObject();
576            reportArg.put("source", this.getName());
577            reportArg.put("type", this.object.getCurrentTransitionYaml());
578            reportArg.put("data", combineOutput(result));
579            multiplexer.callByActionName("add", reportArg.toString());
580        }
581    }
582
583    /**
584     * Reports a message to the multiplexer accumulator for logging and WorkflowReporter capture.
585     *
586     * @param nodeName the node name for the source field
587     * @param message the message to report (can include % prefix for WorkflowReporter)
588     */
589    private void reportOutputToMultiplexer(String nodeName, String message) {
590        IIActorSystem sys = (IIActorSystem) this.system();
591        IIActorRef<?> multiplexer = sys.getIIActor("outputMultiplexer");
592        if (multiplexer != null) {
593            JSONObject reportArg = new JSONObject();
594            reportArg.put("source", nodeName);
595            reportArg.put("type", "error");
596            reportArg.put("data", message);
597            multiplexer.callByActionName("add", reportArg.toString());
598        }
599    }
600
601    /**
602     * Combines stdout and stderr into a single output string.
603     */
604    private String combineOutput(Node.CommandResult result) {
605        String output = result.getStdout().trim();
606        String stderr = result.getStderr().trim();
607        if (!stderr.isEmpty()) {
608            output = output.isEmpty() ? stderr : output + "\n[stderr]\n" + stderr;
609        }
610        return output;
611    }
612
613    /**
614     * Extracts a meaningful error message from an ExecutionException.
615     *
616     * <p>Prioritizes IOException messages (which contain our detailed SSH error messages)
617     * over the raw library exception messages.</p>
618     */
619    private String extractRootCauseMessage(ExecutionException e) {
620        Throwable cause = e.getCause();
621
622        // Look for IOException first - it contains our detailed error messages
623        Throwable current = cause;
624        while (current != null) {
625            if (current instanceof java.io.IOException) {
626                return current.getMessage();
627            }
628            current = current.getCause();
629        }
630
631        // Fall back to the immediate cause message
632        return cause != null ? cause.getMessage() : e.getMessage();
633    }
634
635    /**
636     * Extracts a command string from JSON array arguments.
637     *
638     * <p>Expects arguments in the format: {@code ["command string"]}</p>
639     *
640     * @param arg the JSON array argument string
641     * @return the extracted command string
642     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the argument format is invalid
643     */
644    private String extractCommandFromArgs(String arg) {
645        try {
646            JSONArray jsonArray = new JSONArray(arg);
647            if (jsonArray.length() == 0) {
648                throw new IllegalArgumentException("Command arguments cannot be empty");
649            }
650            return jsonArray.getString(0);
651        } catch (Exception e) {
652            throw new IllegalArgumentException(
653                "Invalid command argument format. Expected JSON array with command string: " + arg, e);
654        }
655    }
656
657}
